long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download scientific articles with human readable names.

Do you download many scientific articles and tired of names like 1-s2.0-S0896627302006530-main.pdf? Save time with this extension. It allows you to download files with names like Esch_et_al__2005__Neuroendocrinology_Letters__The_neurobiology_of_love.pdf instead.

NOTE: this is a prototype. It works only on https://scholar.google.com/. If you want support for other sites or have other ideas, please reach out to me via https://becausecurious.me/contact.
